entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Maple Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:04 AM CST Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Maple Creek 05:00 AM CST Saturday 25 March 2023
Temperature: -4.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -6.4°C
Wind: NNE 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Fog dissipating. High minus 3 except plus 4 near the Trans-Canada Highway.
entry.summary: Fog dissipating this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3 except plus 4 near the Trans-Canada Highway. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 16 except minus 6 near the Trans-Canada Highway.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming west 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 16 except minus 6 near the Trans-Canada Highway. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 25 March 2023
